meaningMnemonic: That <radical>penguin</radical> over there seems to have a <radical>towel</radical> stuffed with <kanji>cash</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Your eyes follow the <kanji>cash</kanji>, and you watch as the penguin stuffs it, towel and all, into a <reading>hay</reading> (へい) stack. What a smart penguin, people don't look for cash in hay, they're too busy looking for needles.
